metadata.title: USN-5657-1 -- Graphite2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Graphite2 mishandled specially crafted files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5657-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgraphite2-doc - 1.3.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1 libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1 libgraphite2-dev - 1.3.10-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
